mapper.select: SELECT kcc.id, kcc.title, kcc.content_type contentType, xau.nickname, kcc.update_time updateTime FROM kf_content_broadcast_bind kcbb LEFT JOIN kf_content kc ON kcbb.content_id = kc.id LEFT JOIN kf_content kcc ON kcbb.bind_id = kcc.id LEFT JOIN kf_admin_user xau ON kc.update_uid = xau.id WHERE kcc.content_type = 4 AND kcbb.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY kcbb.order_number DESC, kcc.update_time DESC

SELECT kc.id, kc.title, kc.content_type contentType FROM kf_content kc LEFT JOIN kf_content_broadcast kcb ON kcb.cid = kc.id WHERE kc.content_type = 4 AND kc.id NOT IN ( SELECT c.bind_id FROM kf_content_broadcast_bind c WHERE c.content_id = #{contentId})AND kc.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' ) ORDER BY kc.update_time DESC

SELECT "http://kanfaimage.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/defaultlogo.png" share_img, kf_channel_content.content_id, kf_channel_content.from_type, kf_channel_content.type, kf_live.id, kf_live.cover_img AS image, kf_live.live_status +1 AS broad_status, kf_live.view_count, kf_live.comment_count, kf_live.title, kf_live.live_type_id, kf_live.live_content AS share_desc FROM kf_channel_content LEFT JOIN kf_live ON kf_channel_content.content_id = kf_live.id WHERE kf_channel_content.channel_id = #{channel_id} AND kf_channel_content.type = #{type} AND kf_channel_content.is_publish = 1 AND kf_channel_content.is_delete = 1 AND kf_channel_content.check_status = 1 ORDER BY kf_channel_content.top DESC, kf_channel_content.publish_time DESC

SELECT kf_content.id, kf_content.category cate, kf_content.content_type type, kf_content.introduction AS share_desc, kf_content.title, kf_content.image, kf_content.view_count views, kf_content.comment_count comments, kf_content_broadcast.broadcast_status broad_status, kf_content_video.duration FROM kf_channel_content LEFT JOIN kf_content ON kf_channel_content.content_id = kf_content.id LEFT JOIN kf_content_broadcast ON kf_content.id = kf_content_broadcast.cid LEFT JOIN kf_content_video ON kf_content.id = kf_content_video.cid WHERE kf_channel_content.channel_id = #{channel_id} AND kf_channel_content.type IN (4, 9) AND kf_channel_content.is_publish = 1 AND kf_channel_content.is_delete = 1 AND kf_channel_content.check_status = 1 ORDER BY kf_channel_content.top DESC, kf_channel_content.publish_time DESC
